Actions.Name: Strafe Shot
Actions.Effects: May dash 1 before and after attack. Ignores cover and deals bonus damage against bloodied foes.

Actions.Name: Swindle
Actions.Description: Swap places with a character in range 3, teleporting. Foes can save to avoid this effect.

Actions.Name: Reveal Pit
Actions.Description: The Grub chooses a foe in range 6, then creates a pit underneath them. The chosen character can save to jump out of the way, moving themselves 1 space to a side of their choice on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Dig Tunnel
Actions.Description: The Grub chooses two pit spaces on the battlefield and connects them with a tunnel. Any character can use a free action to teleport from one end of the tunnel to the next, as long as the other end of the tunnel is unoccupied.
